DOC.brief_title: Vigorous Moderate Exercise Enhancing Active Surveillance Patients With Localized Prostate Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To determine feasibility perform vigorous intensity aerobic exercise use progressive , high-intensity interval training ( HIIT ) standard stationary cycling 'cybercycling ' compare moderate intensity aerobic exercise standard stationary cycling prostate cancer ( PCa ) survivor active surveillance ( AS ) . II . To explore potential effect vigorous intensity aerobic exercise ( HIIT ) use standard cycle 'cybercycling ' compare moderate intensity standard cycling change quality life ( QoL ) , cognition , fitness circulate inflammatory biomarkers PCa-specific marker progression ( prostate specific antigen [ PSA ] , time AT ) PCa survivor active surveillance ( AS ) ; , explore effect may mediate change body fat . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 3 arm . ARM I : Patients perform moderate intensity exercise stationary bike 20-50 minute , three day week 16 week . ARM II : Patients perform HIIT exercise standard stationary bike , three day week 16 week . ARM III : Patients perform HIIT exercise cybercycle use race game , three day week 16 week . After completion study , patient follow 6 12 month .
DOC.criteria: Adult men race body size histologically confirm localized PCa AS Approved contact treat urologist Meet screen criterion Complete American Heart Association ( AHA ) /American College Sports Medicine ( ACSM ) exercise questionnaire Undergo cardiopulmonary exercise ( CPX ) test utilizing cycle ergometer . If CPX test terminate secondary hemodynamic instability , arrhythmias ischemic sign , patient ineligible . Patients unable provide inform consent Patients participate structured exercise program past 6 month ( mo ) Patients available followup test Patients preexist medical condition would barrier exercise
